name: Slap Haider
description:
This is a game where you can slap a stickman called Haider. Try to get the most slaps on him! 

Wanna know the lore of this game? Check out this project! https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/701015496/

Press Space to slap Haider!

PS: This is the most stupidest game I've made so far.

do not click 9 or 4

AND DO NOT PRESS M OR 7

OR TYPE IN QAIS OR DETER
